ygData.subject: Re:What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually shiverback has the monk GM look- same as cured.  So the level 50 monks do have some of the same look as the level 1-20s. And I m willing to make a
ygData.messageBody:
Actually shiverback has the monk GM look- same as cured. So the level
50 monks do have some of the same look as the level 1-20s.

And I'm willing to make a very big bet that 95% of level 30-45 monks are
wearing cured in at least one place- shoulders. :) The other 5% are
wearing mesh there.


Clarity Harvestmoon,
Karana

>Cured silk makes you look like a monk? I would have to disagree, what
>makes us look like monks are the fact that we look like newbies. I
>personally much prefer foreman's tunic. Here is a comparison
>
>Cured Silk Gi
>8ac
>0.1wt
>
>Foreman's Tunic
>10ac
>+3str +3dex
>WEIGHTLESS
>
>you have .1 less weight, 2 more ac, and +3 str. Ok, so it looks leather
>but who cares. Once you get to 30 you won't wear anything that looks
>like cured silk. Thats because there is better stuff out there
>
>--
>
>Hammeron
>Monk of Quellious
>Karana
